messages.subject: Lost Book at Conference
messages.msgSnippet: Hi All, First sorry for the cross post. I m taking a chance that maybe one of you that checked out after I did at the Clarion may have picked up a bag of book
messages.messageBody:
Hi All,
First sorry for the cross post. I'm taking a chance that maybe one of
you that checked out after I did at the Clarion may have picked up a bag of
book from FUN Books I left there. Jonathan smashed his finger in the car
door as we were packing up. The bag of books would have been right there in
front of the check out desk. That's where I was when he came in from the
accident. I've called the hotel and they said it wasn't turned in. They are
to call me if they find it. I high doubt they will. :-( I'm oh so sad.

Barb E
